Question: IDeA Ocean Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
IDeA Ocean Inc.

Product: METHEUS

- Autonomous solution for mechanical design challenges
- Recognized as a CES 2024 Innovation Award Product
- Specializes in mechanism design for machines and robots
- Uses big data and AI-driven technology to streamline mechanism design
- Aims to advance METHEUS to include 3D models of mechanisms
- Enhances mechanism designs to reduce design time and costs while achieving optimal efficiency in mechanism design
